column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: やめマッスル…
column4: No pay, no way.

column3: はじめマッスル！
column4: Let's do this thing!

column3: 遠慮しときます
column4: I'll pass.

column3: やりマッスル！
column4: Count me in, brother!

column3: ルール説明して
column4: Explain the rules.

column3: つづけマッスル！
column4: I'll never give up!

column3: あきらめマッスル…
column4: Yeah, I'm done.

column3: そこ どいて下さい
column4: Um...please move.

column3: さよなら
column4: Riiight. Leaving now.

column3: マッスル！ここはゴロン族の アツいトレーニング場ゴロ！一人前のオトコになるための修行場ゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!By the gods, I love me some muscle.
This right here is our hard-core
training ground, string bean.This is where we come to get RIPPED.
AND. SHREDDED. It's where Goron boys
become Goron men, brother!

column3:
オマエのド根性を見せてくれるゴロか？！
トレーニングは一回20ルピーゴロ！
column4:
You gonna show us your grit?!
Props, brother! OK, so one training
session'll cost ya 20 rupees.

column3:
なんと弱気な発言！
とてもとても残念ゴロォ！
思い直したらまた来るゴロ！
オマエの挑戦を待っているゴロ！
column4:
Your response is as weak as your biceps!
I'm disappointed in ya, brother!

Find your grit and rethink some things
in life, then come back. I'll be waitin'!
I wanna see what you're made of!

column3:
ルピーが足りないゴロ！
それでは トレーニングは受けられないゴロ！
column4:
Wha?! Ya don't have enough rupees!
This is trainin', not charity, brother!

column3:
トレーニングで集める額は100ルピーゴロ！
こんな数字 アツいオトコなら余裕ゴロ！
ルピーが足りなかったら時間内にゴールしても
失格になるゴロ！気を付けるゴロ！
では…
column4:
You've gotta collect 100 rupees as ya
climb. A hard-core Goron man should
be able to handle that no problem!
Even if ya reach the goal before time
runs out, if ya don't grab enough
rupees, ya fail! DON'T FAIL, BROTHER!
Got it? Good. Then it's finally time for...

column3:
おお！なんという事だゴロ！
制限時間を越えてしまったゴロ！
悔しいだろうが
拾ったルピーは あげられないゴロ！
今回は残念だったゴロ！
オマエの次の挑戦を待っているゴロ！
column4:
Huh? What do ya think you're
doin', brother?! Ya went over
the time limit!
I know it seems harsh, but I can't let ya
keep those rupees! Ya didn't earn 'em.

Tough luck, my minuscule friend.
But I'll be waitin' if ya wanna take the
challenge again. Don't let me down!

column3:
アァメイジンンッグ！！トレーニングは見事に合格ゴロォ！！このハードなトレーニングをクリアするとは…オレ達 ド根性三兄弟の
四人目を名乗っていいゴロ！
約束通り この舞台に立たせてやるゴロ！
column4:
UNBELIEVABLE!!You've passed our training with the grit
of a true Goron, my brother! In fact...
you've earned the right to call yourself...the fourth Goron Blood Brother!!


As promised, you are now allowed to
stand on this sacred platform of Goron
manliness. A real honor, I know.
You're officially one of us now!
Our true Goron brother, brother!
Welcome to the family!

column3:
ホット！ここは ゴロン族のトレーニング場ゴロ！
ガケを登って自分の根性を示すゴロ！
挑戦したいなら ガケの上にいる
兄貴に話してみるといいゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!This hotness here is a training ground
for manly Goron men. We climb this cliff
like it's nothin', to prove our grit!
If you've got some guts in that tiny
belly of yours, then talk to my big bro
up top and prove it!

column3:
マッチョ！ここでやっている ド根性ガケ登りは
ゴロン族伝統のトレーニングゴロ！
ルールを知りたいなら ガケの上にいる
兄貴に話してみるといいゴロ！
column4:
BEYOND MACHO!!The Gut Check Challenge is an incredibly
macho version of traditional Goron
training, little man.
If ya wanna learn how it's done, go talk
to my big bro on top of the cliff!

column3:
…スウェッ… ト…ト…トレーニングするゴロォ…
がんばれボク…がんばれ…ゴロ……
ああ…ボクがリト族なら
風に乗って…上までひとっ飛び…なのに…
column4:
So sweaty... Brother...Hi... I'm trainin'...and sweaty...
Go me... I can do it... Brother...

Argh... If I were a Rito...I could just fly
right up there... If only...

column3:
やらないのかゴロ？！
オマエならやれると思うゴロ？！
考えが変わったら また来るゴロ！
オマエの挑戦を待っているゴロ！
column4:
What?! You're backin' down from the
challenge? But you look so strong!
Maybe I was wrong about you...
Come back if ya change your mind.
I'll be waitin'. Really! I wanna see
you in action, tiny brother!

column3:
よーし！ いい返事だゴロ！
ハンパなく鍛えてやるから覚悟するゴロ！
アツいトレーニングの内容を説明するゴロ！
ルールはきわめて簡単ゴロ！
column4:
Ha! Good answer, brother!
We're gonna shred you to pieces,
little man. Prepare your tiny self! 
OK, lemme explain how this hard-core
training works. The rules are dead
simple. Simple as a deadlift, brother!

column3:
ロッソ！おお！"急ぐんだゴロ！
もうトレーニングは始まっているゴロ！
それとも拾ったルピーを返して
トレーニングを あきらめてしまうのかゴロ？
column4:
It's heatin' up!Huh?! You'd better hurry, brother!
Your training's already started!

Or are ya here to give up and gimme
back the rupees ya picked up?

column3:
…ムッシュ…オマエもガケ登りに挑戦する…ゴロ…？
オオトコ前ゴロ……
ああ…ボクがリト族なら
風に乗って…上までひとっ飛び…なのに…
column4:
I'm a manly Goron man... Brother...Oh... Are you takin' the Gut Check
Challenge too...brother?

That's so...manly... So Goronly even...
*sigh* If only I had Rito wings...then I
could just fly right up there... If only...

column3:
…マスラオ…！オマエはなんて…オトコ前なんだゴロ…！
頑張れゴロ…頑張れゴロォオ…！
column4:
So manly... Brother...You're a true...manly Goron man...
Do your best... Brother...

column3:
待て待てゴロ！なんという事ゴロ！
トレーニングから逃げ出すとは言語道断ゴロ！
ここから離れすぎたら失格ゴロ！
拾ったルピー返してもらうゴロ！！
オマエの次の挑戦を待っているゴロ！
column4:
WAIT. ONE. MINUTE. BROTHER!What are ya doin'?! You're runnin'
away? From training? From a challenge?!
Unthinkable! Unimaginable! Uncool!
I'm afraid I'm gonna have to disqualify
ya this time. That means you've gotta
gimme back the rupees ya picked up.
But hey, I'll be here waitin' if ya ever
wanna try the challenge again!

column3:
ルールは簡単ゴロ！
もう一回説明するから よく聞くゴロ！
column4:
The rules are dead simple. Simple as a
deadlift, brother! I'll explain them again,
so listen closely this time!

column3:
うおお！足りないゴロ！ルピーが目標に足りてないゴロ！もう一度やればきっといけるゴロ！
オマエの次の挑戦を待っているゴロ！
column4:
NO! Not good enough, brother!Ya didn't pick up enough rupees!
Not even close, tiny person.But hey, I just know if ya try it again,
you'll find your inner Goron and prevail!
I'll be waitin' for ya, brother!

column3:
…言い忘れてたが トレーニングは有料ゴロ！
1回20ルピーゴロ！挑戦するゴロ？！
column4:
Oh! Almost forgot a tiny detail, tiny man.
No train, no gain. And no pay, no stay!
So yeah. It's 20 rupees per attempt.
You want summa this, brother?!

column3:
ど どういう事ゴロ？これだけしか集められないとはゴロ！これはオマエの実力ではないはずゴロ！
オマエの次の挑戦を待っているゴロ！
column4:
What happened, brother?!Is that really all the rupees you were
able to collect?! That's hardly hard-core!I just know this isn't your true power,
little man! Goron up and try again.
I'll be waitin' for ya!

column3:
なんとぉお！！惜しいゴロ！100ルピーに わずかに届いてないゴロ！今回は残念だったゴロ！
オマエの次の挑戦を待っているゴロ！
column4:
WHAAAT?! Tough luck, brother!You were close, but ya didn't quite
Goron up enough to get 100 rupees.Better luck next time, tiny Hylian!
I know ya can do it if ya really try.
I'll be waitin' for ya, brother!

column3:
ッゴゴ ゴォールゥウウ！！エェックセレントォオーー！！よくやったゴロ！
では獲得ルピーを確認するゴロ！
獲得したルピー額は…ルピーゴロォオー！
column4:
GOOOOOAAAAL!!That was GLORIOUS!Nice goin', brother! Now let's see
how many rupees ya scored.
Looks like ya got... rupees!

column3:
ガケの下からスタートして制限時間内に
ここまで登ってくるんだゴロ！
ただし！登ってくるだけでは ダメゴロ！
ガケの途中にあるルピーを拾ってくるゴロ！
時間内にガケを登り指定した額以上のルピーを
拾ってくれば合格だゴロ！
時間内に登れなかったり
途中でやめてしまった時は…
拾ったルピー返してもらうゴロ！！
column4:
Startin' from the bottom, ya gotta climb
back up here within the time limit.

BUT! Don't fool yourself into thinking it's
only a climbin' challenge, little man.
You've gotta pick up rupees as ya go!
Get up the cliff within the time limit,
and grab a passable number of rupees.
Do that, and you pass the test!
If ya run outta time or decide to give
up halfway through your climb...

You'll have to return all the
rupees ya picked up!
That's life, brother.

column3:
オノレの肉体の限界精神の限界を試す
アツいトレーニングゴロ！
では今から…ド根性ガケ登りを始めるゴロ！！
column4:
We're gonna help ya push past your
limits, brother. Your physical, mental,
AND emotional limits!
OK, enough messin' around. It's time for
the hardest of hard-core feats...GUT CHECK CHALLENGE!

column3: 説明は以上ゴロ！
column4: That's all there is to it, brother!

column3:
マッシブ！この場所は オレ達 ド根性三兄弟が
認めた奴しか乗れない特別な舞台ゴロ！
悪いがどいてもらうゴロ！
認められたければ トレーニングするゴロ！
column4:
BRUTAL!Brutally rude, tiny Hylian! This sacred
platform is only for true Goron men,
as decided by the Goron Blood Brothers.
So shove off, non-brother! If you want
respect, ya gotta train hard to earn it!

column3:
よく言ったゴロ！さあ！兄貴のところまで
全力でアツく登っていくんだゴロ！
column4:
Well said, brother!Now go! Use all the grit ya got to climb
up to where my bro is! Get fired up!

column3:
わかったゴロ…
ルピーは全て返してもらうゴロ…
オノレの限界を知り認めるオマエは
アツく そしてクールなオトコだゴロ！
この勇気ある撤退を称えるゴロ！
そして！再び挑戦する時を待っているゴロ！！
column4:
Really? How disappointing. Well then,
I guess I'll be takin' back those rupees
you collected.I will say, for you to know and respect
your limits earns ya some props
in my book.
I commend your courageous retreat!
But! I'll be waitin' for the day ya
come back to try again, brother!

column3: ハァ… ハァ…
column4: *pant* *pant*

column3: ド根性ゴロ！
column4: Strength is king!

column3: 根性見せるゴロ！
column4: Show me your power!

column3: ド根性ガケ登りぃいい！！スタートゴロォオオーー！！
column4: GUT CHECK CHALLENGE!!GOOOO!

column3:
どくわけにはいかないゴロ！ここは オレ達 ド根性三兄弟が認めたオトコしか
立てない特別な舞台ゴロ！
今は うちの末っ子が
トレーニングの真っ最中ゴロ！
…とはいえ オマエも
なかなか根性がありそうなオトコ！
よし オマエもトレーニングするゴロ！もし このトレーニングをクリアできたら
ここを どいてもいいゴロ！
column4:
I AIN'T MOVIN' A MUSCLE,
BROTHER! Not a single,
well-defined muscle!This is a special platform! Sacred even!
Only real Goron men, as decided by us
three Goron Blood Brothers, are allowed.
Besides, my littlest bro is in the middle
of trainin' right now. A brother does NOT
interrupt a brother's trainin', brother!
But I gotta say...ya do seem like a real
man of action. Almost like you have a
Goron air about ya. I like it!
SO WHAT ARE YA WAITIN' FOR,
BROTHER?! GET TRAININ'!Yeah, that's it! If you can clear our
hard-core training program, I'll move
outta your way!

column3:
マッスル！ここはゴロン族の アツいトレーニング場！
一人前のオトコになるための修行場ゴロ！
このトレーニングをクリアできたら
ここを どいてもいいゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!By the gods, I love me some muscle.
This right here is our hard-core
training ground, string bean.This is where we come to get RIPPED.
AND. SHREDDED. It's where Goron boys
become Goron men, brother!
But if you can clear our hard-core
training program, I'll move outta
your way!

column3:
そして…四人目の兄弟よ！
ド根性ガケには何度でも挑戦できるゴロ！
さらに難しいコースも用意しているゴロ！
挑戦したくなったら声をかけるゴロ！！
column4:
And good news, fourth brother!
That means you can do the GUT
CHECK CHALLENGE all you want!
As a Goron Blood Brother, you're ready
for the HARD stuff! Just lemme know
when you're pumped enough to try it!

column3:
マッスル！ガマンくらべを耐えたオトコよ よく来たゴロ！
ここはゴロン族の アツいトレーニング場…
ド根性ガケ！！さらなる上を目指すオトコの修行場ゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Hey, you're the guy who won the contest
of endurance! Welcome to our Goron
training ground, the home of...
Gut Check Challenge!!This is where we come to get RIPPED.
AND. SHREDDED. It's where Goron boys
become Goron men, brother!

column3:
簡単に どくわけには いかないゴロ！ここはド根性ガケを制覇した者だけが立てる
特別な舞台ゴロ！
今は うちの末っ子が頂上目指して
トレーニングの真っ最中だゴロ！
…とはいえ オマエは
ガマンくらべを耐えた オトコ
よし オマエもトレーニングするゴロ！もし このトレーニングをクリアできたら
ここを どいてもいいゴロ！
column4:
I AIN'T MOVIN' A MUSCLE,
BROTHER! Not a single,
well-defined muscle!This right here is a special platform
that's only for those who've conquered
the Gut Check Challenge!
Besides, my littlest bro is in the middle
of trainin' right now. A brother does NOT
interrupt a brother's trainin', brother!
That said...you ARE the guy who won
the contest of endurance. So I guess
my question is...
WHAT ARE YA WAITIN' FOR,
BROTHER?! GET TRAININ'!Yeah, that's it! If you can clear our
extreme training program, I'll move
outta your way!

column3:
マッスル！ガマンくらべを耐えたオトコ！
ここはゴロン族の アツいトレーニング場…
ド根性ガケ！！このトレーニングをクリアできたら
ここを どいてもいいゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Hey, you're the guy who won the contest
of endurance! Welcome to our Goron
training ground, the home of...
Gut Check Challenge!If you can clear this extreme training
program, I'll move outta your way,
brother!

column3:
アァメイジンンッグ！！トレーニングは見事に合格ゴロォ！！このハードなトレーニングも
ガマンくらべも クリアするとは…
オレ達 ド根性三兄弟の
四人目を名乗っていいゴロ！
約束通り この舞台に立たせてやるゴロ！
column4:
UNBELIEVABLE!!You've passed our training with the
grit of a true Goron, my brother!!Now that you've managed to clear our
extreme training AND the contest of
endurance...
You've earned the right to call yourself...
the fourth Goron Blood Brother!

As promised, you are now allowed to
stand on this sacred platform of Goron
manliness. You're honored, I know.
Now you're officially and irrevocably one
of us! Our true Goron brother, brother!
Welcome to the family!

column3:
ホット！おお！
オマエはガマンくらべに耐えたオトコ！
ここで会ったのも何かの導き！
ゴロン族のトレーニング場へ よく来たゴロ！
ガケの上にいる兄貴に話して
一人前を目指せゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!Oh! You're the guy who won the contest
of endurance!

Some undying need for gains must have
guided you here. I'm sure of it. Welcome
to our extreme Goron training ground!
You should talk to my big bro up at the
top so you can achieve full-on Goron
manliness, brother!

column3:
…スウェッ… ト…オマエは…ガマンくらべの… オトコ…
ボクには…登れない…このガケ…
オマエなら…できるゴロ…ああ…ボクがリト族なら
風に乗って…上までひとっ飛び…なのに…
column4:
So sweaty... Brother...Oh... You're the guy...from the contest
of...endurance... I can't climb...
this cliff...brother...
But you... I bet you can do it...*sigh* If only I were a Rito...I could just
fly right up there... If only...

column3:
マッスル？！ガマンくらべを途中でやめた オトコ！
こんなところで出会うとは！
ここはゴロン族の アツいトレーニング場…ド根性ガケ！！さらなる上を目指すオトコの修行場ゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP...BROTHER?!Hey, you're the guy who gave up during
the contest of endurance!
Didn't think I'd see YOU here.
This is our extremely hard-core Goron
training ground, the home of...Gut Check Challenge!!This is where we come to get RIPPED.
AND. SHREDDED. It's where Goron boys
become Goron men, brother!

column3:
どくわけには いかないゴロ！ここは オレ達 ド根性三兄弟が認めたオトコしか
立てない特別な舞台ゴロ！
今は うちの末っ子が
トレーニングの真っ最中ゴロ！
…とはいえ オマエは
ガマンくらべも耐えられないオトコ…
よし オマエもトレーニングするゴロ！もし このトレーニングをクリアできたら
ここを どいてもいいゴロ！
column4:
I AIN'T MOVIN' A MUSCLE,
BROTHER! Not a single,
well-defined muscle!This is a special platform! Sacred even!
Only real Goron men, as decided by us
three Goron Blood Brothers, are allowed.
Besides, my littlest bro is in the middle
of trainin' right now. A brother does NOT
interrupt a brother's trainin', brother!
That said...you ARE the guy who failed
the contest of endurance. So there's
only one thing for you to do...
GET TRAININ', BROTHER!Yeah, that's it! If you can clear our
hard-core training program, I'll move
outta your way!

column3:
マッスル！ガマンくらべを途中でやめたオトコ！
ここはゴロン族の アツいトレーニング場…
ド根性ガケ！！このトレーニングをクリアできたら
ここを どいてもいいゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Hey, you're the guy who gave up during
the contest of endurance!

This is our extremely hard-core Goron
training ground, the home of...

Gut Check Challenge!!If you can clear this training program,
I'll move outta your way!

column3:
ホット！オマエはガマンくらべを
途中であきらめたオトコ！
ガマンくらべを耐えるために
ここでトレーニングを するといいゴロ！
ガケの上にいる兄貴に話して
一人前を目指せゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!Hey, you're the guy who gave up during
the contest of endurance!

If you're serious about winnin' the
contest, you should train here first!

Go on, talk to my big bro up at the top
so you can achieve full-on Goron
manliness, brother!

column3:
…スウェッ… ト…オマエは…
ガマンくらべを ほったらかしているオトコ…
でも…ボクはオマエに…
何も言えない ゴロ……
ああ…ボクがリト族なら
風に乗って…上までひとっ飛び…なのに…
column4:
So sweaty... Brother...Oh... You're the guy...who turned
his back on...the contest...
of endurance...
But hey... I'm not one...to judge...


*sigh* If only I were a Rito...then I could
just fly right up there... If only...
